instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
threads.message:
No backlight and no power from battery, history liquid damage (orange juice)

PP3V42_G3H 3.4v
PPBUS_G3H 8.3V (need 12v)

SMC_BC_ACOK 3.4V

PIN 17/18 OF U7100 5 OHMS
PIN 27/28 OF U7100 20 OHMS

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
[SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
threads.message: PPBUS is 8.4V on these. First lets get backlight back. Also expect a dead battery or SMC ahead. Corrosion around LP8550?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
[SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
[SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
threads.message:
i will replaced U7701, 
Backlight is powered by PPBUS_G3H for this model ? 
what is size of ball for this ship i have stencil Universal

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
threads.message: Stencil? Why? New chip has balls. Read the sticky on backlight repair and check feed back trace to ball A5 when chip is removed.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
threads.message: replaced U7701 same problem backlight 2 seconde at startup and stop,

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
threads.message: SMC_LID high? Replace IO board and cable.

threads.message: i order io board and cable, what does it mean LID ?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
threads.message: LID as in lid, cover, etc. The LCD cover

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
threads.message: Backlight should also come back if you power this on without the flat cable connected.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3437-B No backlight, no power from battery
threads.message: yes backlight work without the flat cable, i replaced ioboard and flat cable all work solved thanks
